| History                 = The Huns were a Latino street gang in NY City which was at war with the [[Street Amazons (Earth-616)|Street Amazons]]. It purchased high-tech guns from Mr. Carbine and Ice. They were attacked by their rivals the Street Amazons who had been equipped with power armor supplied by Sidney Fishburne , the Street Amazons attacked the Huns. Once Fishburne no longer needed the Street Amazons, their battle suits disappeared making the fight more even.{{r|Killpower: The Early Years Vol 1 3}}
